author: Stan Kreitz
comment: Great app - BIG numbers on range finder - other numbers too small on scoring page and scoring card - hard to read outdoors.

author: William Leigh
comment: Excellent golf app, does evening I want! Yardages to anywhere I want.  Does not need WiFi or cell, completely contained in the phone.

author: lee love
comment: Would be the best app on the market if the updated the index on the courses still playing in 2017 which  basically makes the.scoring usless.

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Hi, Lee!

Please contact our mapping heroes at mapping@hole19golf.com!!! They'll update your course details on a glimpse ;)

Looking forward to seeing your 5 stars rating!

Happy Golfing,
Team Hole19

author: ian truter
comment: Great app

author: Carl Askew
comment: App looks great. Just synced a course and the distances are in Metres. Is there a way to convert it to yards

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Hi, Carl.

Thank you so much for your support!!!

To change the 'Distance Units' to Imperial, please simply do the following: 1 - Tap 'More' at the bottom bar; 2 -Preferences; 3 - Imperial

Happy to help!
Team Hole19

author: Heinz Habermann
comment: Great

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Thanks for your support, Heinz!

Happy Golfing,
Team Hole19

author: joe tiwana
comment: Great app, very comprehensive course list. Used many times and has never let me down especially distance critical shots !

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Thank you so much for your support!

Happy Golfing,
Team Hole19

author: Jason Paizes
comment: Very very cool app. I was recommended it by a friend and was not disappointed. Thanks guys, great job...

reply.content:

author: Dermot Brady
comment: Found it very reliable,  picked up courses that weren't available on others expensive GPS systems .

reply.content:

author: Paul Wileman
comment: Best golf app used so far, with very accurate gps and features

reply.content:

author: samharmsworth1
comment: Distances aren't truly accurate, usually a few yards off

reply.content:

comment: Really enjoy the app. Helps out a lot. And is pretty accurate

author: Bryan Fitzgerald
comment: I have another GPS appliance so only use this on course in emergencies but it does a really good job. I often enter details of my round afterwards so I have access to the analysis.

author: Agustin De La Hidalga
comment: Used it for exactly what I wanted. GPS distance to the pin on my Smart Watch. Not scoring, just distances without constantly reaching in my pocket for my phone.

author: Mogamat Nieftagodien
comment: Excellent app, of great assistance on the course and record keeping.

author: Shukre Parker
comment: App is okay for distance only. I could not figure out how to enter my scores or record the distance per shot per club

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content: Hey, Shukre. Thanks for reaching out! Please check the following article to understand how to use the Advanced Mode: https://hole19.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/115003355009-Advanced-Input-shot-by-shot-tracking- Contact our Support team at help@hole19golf.com if you have any other question or concern. Happy to help! Team Hole19

author: Ashley Chandler
comment: Works great as a GPS and a scorecard. Love it!
Once in a while an app comes along that is truly awesome. This is it.

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Thank you so much for your support!

Happy Golfing,
Team Hole19

author: Liam Hennessy
comment: Latest updates fixed a few issues, app is amazing. My favourite golf app by far.

author: Neal Bernhardt
comment: First time used it and it was really easy and fun... great app and works well with wear link devices

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Thank you so much for your support!

Happy Golfing,
Team Hole19

author: Matthew Mccrea
comment: Would be even better if it updated the handicap automatically

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Hello, Matthew!

Thanks for your support.

Glad to inform we will have goods news really soon. Stay tuned!

author: Sue Hold
comment: Have only used it once after downloading the app. impressed

reply.content:

comment: Very good

reply.content:
Hello!

comment: Great

author: thomas nelson
comment: Great

author: Graeme Reid
comment: The first time I used this app on my home course, it had the order of the holes wrong. I emailed support and they had it fixed the next day. Awesome customer service!

author: David Hyatt
comment: It's OK. Not overly accurate but at my level of golf not important. And it's free. Used today for first time 'somethimg went wrong' after 10 holes and wouldn't work again for the round.

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Hi, David.

Thanks for rating and reviewing Hole19.

Could you please contact our team at help@hole19golf.com explaining the issues you have been experiencing? We'd love to help you overcome this situation.

Please make sure you have the latest Hole19 update.

Cheers,
Team Hole19

author: Angus Szoke
comment: Crashes and won't open since update

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Hi, Angus.

Thanks for your feedback.

This crash was already solved, could you please make sure to update your App?

Contact help@hole19golf.com for further guidance.

Kind regards,
Team Hole19

author: Jon Pintoff
comment: Doesn't open

author: Michael McGarry
comment: Can't get the app to even load on my Fossil Q Venture. Returns an error every time. Which is a bummer because it looks like this app would be great

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Hi, Michael.

Thanks for reaching out.

Could you please make sure to update the app both on watch and phone? This should solve the issue. If not, please contact our Support team at help@hole19golf.com for further guidance. They'll be happy to help!

Kind regards,
Team Hole19

author: john lepak
comment: Doesn't work with tag connected.  Can't figure out how to cancel.  Likely be paying for this garbage in perpetuity which is great for them bad for me.

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Hi, John.

Please contact our Support team at help@hole19golf.com mentioning what is the email address attached to your Hole19 so we can help you.

Kind regards,
Team Hole19

author: Bobby Hannaman
comment: Distances not accurate on some holes making this feature unreliable.  Do like the scotecatd

author: Ray Lewchuk
comment: Worked really good with Samsung Gear 3 until last update.  Now won't keep score in any of the 3 modes.  Also have to start app on Gear watch every time you look for the distance.  Was a good app but not so much anymorr

author: cheeses of Nazareth
comment: Struggle to get it to work on my tag connected smart watch, given up on it

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Hi, Cheeses!

Thanks for rating and reviewing Hole19.

Could you please make sure to update the App both on the watch and phone stores? This should solve the problem.

Contact help@hole19golf.com for further guidance, they'll be happy to help!

Kind regards,
Team Hole19

author: Ed Martin
comment: After the latest update, the watch app is occasionally not syncing with the phone app.  Even though I entered the score on my watch, it doesn't change the score to par and it doesn't register the score on the phone.  Still love the app - I know these issues can be resolved.

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Hi, Ed.

Thank you so much for your support! It's great to have you with us.

There's an option where you can edit your round, please check the following article to know how: https://hole19.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/203561522-Review-Edit-Round

Best regards,
Team Hole19

reply.author: Hole19
reply.content:
Hi, Azi!

Thanks for rating and reviewing Hole19.

Could you please make sure to update the App both on the watch and phone stores? This should solve the problem.

Contact help@hole19golf.com for further guidance, they'll be happy to help!

author: Sam Caulkin
comment: Amazing app for tracking scores and also using for mapping for courses and yardage etc. I never play without it. Thank you very much!

author: Robin Gibbs
comment: Good app - need to add ability to record penalty strokes on the basic (free) wear app as you can do it on the phone app.
Best free golfing app.

author: Cees Rietveld
comment: Just start using it, but it looks perfect
